name: (R) Best HP Pt. FS (Other Fossil Furnace)
_description: Best available air source heat pump w/ original fuel oil/propane furnace backup

notes: COP = SEER / 3.412, COP = HSPF / 3.412 (see EIA source)
split system conversion factors SEER2/SEER = 0.95, HSPF2/HSPF = 0.85 (see RESNET source)

notes: Retail (new) and total installed (existing) for 'High' ASHPs in 2023

For new buildings, also add retail cost of typical oil furnace. For existing buildings, additional tank removal costs of 800 2014$ (975 2022$) are applied for distillate and propane based on the 2015 EIA report, updating the cost from April 2014 to April 2022. Assume no additional electrical infrastructure upgrade costs for dual fuel.

market_scaling_fractions_source.notes: Heating multiples were determined as proportion of total homes with non-NG fossil-based heating that have both cooling and heating systems in each BA climate zone. Cooling multiple of 8% was determined as a proportion of total homes with a cooling system (16,171 homes) where there is heating via a heating energy source other than natural gas, electricity, or biomass AND heating is done via non:steam/hot water system (1,338 homes).
